page.title: 11SHOPKEEPERS IN WADDINGTON
page.content: Shopkeepers in Waddington have a difficult time becouse many of the local people do much of their shopping at the big stores in Lincoln. Some of the shops in lower Waddington have closed down recently and the shops in upper Waddington have found things particularly difficult because of the reduction in servicemen at R.A.F. Waddington. Some shop assistants have been made redundant. In order to compete, the shops tend to concentrate on things other than food and to provide items that the big shops do not. There are several fancy goods and wool shops in Waddington, for instance. Also, to attract custom, the shopkeepers must be willing to keep their shops attractiuely arranged and to spend time chatting with their customers.
